thread.title: Delta Airlines announces new non-stop flight from Raleigh-Durham International Airport in North Carolina to Paris, France - @ABC11_WTVD
thread.title_full: Delta Airlines announces new non-stop flight from Raleigh-Durham International Airport in North Carolina to Paris, France - @ABC11_WTVD

author: Shelley Ng
title: Delta Airlines announces new non-stop flight from Raleigh-Durham International Airport in North Carolina to Paris, France - @ABC11_WTVD
text: TRAVEL Delta to run non-stop flight from RDU to Paris You need Flash to watch this video. Sorry, your browser doesn't support Flash , needs a Flash update , or has Flash disabled. Delta announcement at RDU Thursday (ABC11 Photojournalist Jim Schumacher) Embed <iframe width="476" height="270" src="http://abc11.com/video/embed/?pid=999705" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe> Thursday, September 24, 2015 04:24PM RDU (WTVD) -- Delta Air Lines will soon offer the Triangle a direct connection to the City of Love.The airline will run a non-stop flight from Raleigh-Durham International to Paris, France's Charles de Gaulle Airport.During an official announcement at RDU Thursday, officials said the flight will take off starting next May. Delta nonstop flight from RDU to Paris to begin in May of 2016. #ABC11Eyewitness pic.twitter.com/IkHPstor2O â€” Gloria Rodriguez (@GloriaABC11) September 24, 2015 Flights DL230 and DL231 will be available for purchase starting this Saturday.The flight will operate on the following schedule in conjunction with Delta's partners Air France, KLM and Alitalia using a 164-seat, Boeing 757-200ER aircraft, according to the airline.
